original_title: Όταν ο Ερμής κράτησε την αναπνοή του: Η μάχη της Κρήτης
overview: A COSMOTE TV production that looks back at the historical events that marked the famous battle of Crete, when the "Operation Mercury" of the Nazi forces met unexpected and heroic resistance from the inhabitants of the island.
title: When Ermis Held His Breath: The Battle of Crete
